FAJA SIGMET B01 VALID 180200/180600 FAOR-
FAJA JOHANNESBURG FIR SEV TURB FCST WI
S2344 E03146 - S2420 E03200 - S2509 E03202 - S2507 E03019 -
S2351 E03017 FL300/340==
